runs.comm: lucky start for India, full outside off, goes for a flowing drive, gets a thick inside edge wide of the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
excellent shot, full outside off, makes room and steers that wide of third man where Fernando fails to get his huge body down in time to cut that off. A better effort was warranted there
short of a good length outside off, guided to third man for a single
missed out, full toss on middle and leg, flicked away straight to Fernando at fine leg
poor delivery again, and this time he gets the treatment, full on the pads, glanced down to the fine-leg boundary

run out, Sri Lanka have been gifted a wicket here, dropped on the off side and calls for a quick single, Sehwag calls and charges down towards the strikers end but is beaten by the point fielder Kapugedera who throws down the stumps on the dive to find him well short. Spectacular fielding there
India are struggling here, tries to pull it away over midwicket, gets a top-edge and it's snapped up easily at mid-on by Weeraratne

almost got the third there! Short of a good length outside off, tries to push it away wide of cover, gets an inside edge that just about manages to evade the leg stump, and rolls down the fine-leg boundary
on middle and off, pushed into the off side
worked away wide of midwicket for a single
too wide down the leg side there, given
short on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
just marginally short on the leg stump, walks across and whips it away off his hips behind square leg for a boundary
almost a wide there, good length outside off and moving away further, left alone and the batsman is understandably surprised at the umpire's inaction
short of a length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
given this time, wide outside off again, he shapes himself for a cut, withdraws at the last moment
a touch full outside off, pushed off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single
wide again, too full and way out of the batsman' s reach
short on middle and leg, pushed away to midwicket, decides against the single
slower ball bowled full outside off, chipped lethargically just short of cover-point there, mistimed it completely, was into the shot too early
what a shot! Short on leg stump, and he just slaps that way over fine leg for a big six, reminded me of a shot from David Warner in the first T20 game between SA and Aus
tucked away into the leg side for a single
nipping back and and Raina has no clue, he blindly swings at it and predictably makes no contact
handled this one better, waited for it to come onto him, short on the leg stump, fends it away well wide of fine-leg for a boundary
good length on middle and off, defended on the off side
on the off stump, opens the face to guide it to point

horrendous delivery, wayward ball outside off and Raina almost ran himself out off that dreadful ball, the keeper fumbles and rockets in a throw at the non-strikers end, the bowler takes off the bails but Raina is just in
Fernando is struggling with his line here, too wide again, no confusion this time
follows that up with an absolute beauty, good length on middle and off, zips away just as Yuvraj prods at it off the back foot
short of a length outside leg and moved into Yuvraj, clipped his pads as he tried to work that away on the leg side
played well this time by Raina, straying on the pads, turned away comfortably off the back foot to the fine-leg boundary
pushes it towards cover and scrambles a quick single
on middle and leg, turned away to midwicket
short on the off stump, tries to play away from his body to push it through cover, gets an inside edge back to the bowler
dropped on the leg side and they squeeze a quick single
on middle and leg, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
down the leg side, tries to glance it down fine, misses, but given a wide
too many extras conceded and we are just in the sixth over, wide again
and Thushara pays heavily, good length outside off, Raina, though not to the pitch, hits through the line to loft it over mid-off for a one bounce four
short on middle, turned away to fine leg
short on middle and leg, flicked away off the back foot towards deep square leg
short of a good length on middle and off, defended to cover
well struck but there's cover in the deep, grilled down the ground to long-off, failed to find the gap
paddles that firmly down the leg side but fine leg keeps them to just a single
excellent bouncer! Spat off the pitch after landing on middle, Raina was caught by surprise but evaded it well in the end
no evasive measure this time, bangs it in short again and Raina pulls it away wide of deep square leg for a boundary
down the leg side this time, another run gifted
punched wide of cover for an easy single, they are pacing their innings well here
deliberately played, yorker length outside off, opens the face at the last moment to nudge it well wide of third man for a boundary
too wide outside off, would have been another wide had not Raina chased it and mistimed it to cover
fuller, much closer to off, driven uppishly to deep cover
that's disappeared! Rank long hop on middle, Yuvraj stays his ground and smashes it over midwicket for a massive six
short and wide, cut away to deep point
misfield, and all of a sudden Sri Lanka are struggling, full and wide, driven powerfully wide of deep cover, Bandara has it well covered but allows it to go through his legs over the ropes
drives to drive a good length ball back past the bowler, misses

gone first ball! Short and wide, tries to cut it off the back foot, gets a thick edge and Dilshan snaps it easily behind the wickets. The bowling change has worked wonders and India have to rebuild again
short on middle, pushed away just wide of midwicket, Kapugedara failed to pick it up cleanly, had he done so, Dhoni could well have been run out at the non-strikers end
driven to long-on for a single
short and wide, plays a trademark late-cut to the third-man boundary
pushed off the back foot to long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, driven wide of long-on for a couple
full on the off stump, almost yorker length, tries to dig it out on the off side, gets an inside edge
dropped, googly, tries to open the face to guide it past point, gets a thick edge and Dilshan spills it
flighted on the off stump, heaved away over deep-midwicket for a huge six, duly gets punished
pushed off the front foot to cover, the fielder fumbles and they get another run
tossed up on middle and leg, turned away on the leg side
gets him finally! Tossed up on the off stump, tries to slog-sweep that over the deep midwicket region, gets a top edge and De Saram running in a few steps from the deep takes a well-judged catch
on middle and off, defended
driven down the ground to long-off
tossed up outside off, spun away sharply, Dhoni missed as he tried to play that on the off side, Dilshan takes off the bails but he's dragged his foot back in.
flighted on middle, driven straight to Silva at cover
dropped wide of the cover fielder for a single this time
tossed up on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
full outside off, pushed to long-off
quicker ball fired on middle, spun away to beat the outside edge
pushed it quick down the leg side
another quicker ball on middle, defended on the off side
tossed up on the off, driven down the ground to long-off
short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot wide of long-off for a couple
opens the face to play it wide of point for a single
tossed up on middle, defended back to the bowler
driven wide of midwicket for a quick single
tries to loft that inside-out over extra cover, gets a leading edge on the off side
down the track and pushes it wide of long-on for a single
flighted on middle, driven back to the bowler
worked away behind square for a single
tries to open the face to play it wide of short third, misses as the ball spins away
big wicket! Tossed up on middle and leg, lands on a good length, tries to swing it away over midwicket, fails to connect, and the stumps take a beating
tossed up on middle, driven to cover
driven down the ground to long-ff
flicked away through square leg
tossed up outside off, sees him coming down, holds back the length, Jadeja adjusts at the last moment to guide that to short third
short on middle and off, pushed into the off side

India are sliding here! Charges down the track to deposit it over the long-on boundary, gets under it but ends up lofting it really high without getting much distance on it, Mubarak cups it well after the ball takes forever to get to him
tucked away behind square for a single
makes room, drives it wide of cover for a single
fired in quick on middle, struck powerfully over the bowlers head but Kapugedera pulls off a brilliant save to keep the batsmen to two
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
yorked himself there! Is it all over for India now? Comes down the track, misreads the length completely, fails to bring his bat down in time and the stumps are uprooted
low full toss on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
in the slot and Yusuf cashes in, full outside off, he frees his arms and smashes that over extra cover
another one! Yusuf is fighting to the finish here! Flighted on leg stump, he comes down the track and lofts it cleanly over long-on
tries to slog that over midwicket but is unable to time it well this time
flighted on middle and leg, gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps that well over deep midwicket, into the stands for a maximum.
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, played sensibly wide of cover for a single
Sri Lanka have bled extras today, add five more to that, wayward delivery down the leg side and India won;t need to work too hard if these keep coming
better, full on middle, dragged wide of midwicket
slower one, pushed back uppishly past Fernando for a single towards long-off
perhaps a missed opportunity there, full and wide, makes room to drive it through the covers, is a little early into the shot and only manages a single
steered wide of the deep fielder for a couple
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to point for a quick single
slower one, deceives Irfan completely, bowled short of a length outside off, fails to reach it as he tries to play it towards point
short of a length on middle, pulled away wide of deep midwicket for a couple
full, pitched outside off, tried to swing it away over square leg, got an inside edge onto his pads and they scramble a run
full outside off, slices it away to third man, would have wished that had gone much squarer
shot! Full on the off stump, makes room and  strikes that inside out over extra cover for a one bounce four
just a fraction short on middle, swatted wide of midwicket for a couple
inswinging yorker bang on middle, tries to drive it past midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, cuts away off the pitch, Irfan tries to heave that over midwicket, misses
amazing shot!! Short of a length, Pathan waits for it and pulls it away into the stands over deep midwicket, crucial hit!
sliced away wide of third man, Malina dives to save a couple of runs
Could that be the decisive blow??? Full on the off stump, length ball, lofted between deep cover and long-off for another four
short and wide, there to hit but Irfan misses out
yorker outside off, dug out wide of the bowler and they get a quick single
What a way to finish! Meaty length ball on leg stump and he dismisses that into the stands over midwicket
